title: Improve Windows Dev Center performance for Edge
body: The site Windows Dev Center (https://developer.microsoft.com) is *very* slow when navigating with Edge. We are talking page load times of several minutes in many cases. I have done troubleshooting with Windows developer support who knew about the issue and recommended using another browser, like IE.

comments.body: Tommy, thanks for the feedback on this we definitely appreciate it. We are actively working on several areas with an eye towards performance improvements specifically targeting page load times.
